overview: Ride along with assault troops in this look at the groundbreaking vehicles designed for modern-day warfare. Intense first-person footage puts you inside Bradley and Warrior armored fighting vehicles and M113-A3 armored personnel carriers. You'll also meet the crews of cutting-edge anti-tank and anti-aircraft vehicles and join a recon team as they engage the enemy. Leading expert Bruce Quarrie provides commentary on these impressive machines.
title: Modern Land Warfare: Mobile Warfare
